job title: Senior Business Intelligence Analyst - Web Analytics
job description:
Responsible for providing highly complex analytical and project oversight by conducting financial and website analyses, assisting with internal strategy and ad-hoc projects, and performing competitor and industry benchmarking analysis for a designated Business Line.
Essential Job Functions
Create, test and analyze A/B testing activities in Adobe Target.
Analyze web analytics and digital reports to derive business insights.
Manages data gathering efforts with internal and external business partners.
Participates in the management of complex projects.
Interprets complex analysis and develops presentations for senior management.
Partners with members of other groups and functions within the bank to drive results.
Other Job Duties
Performs other duties as assigned.
Qualifications
Required Experience
· Requires deep knowledge of job area typically obtained through advanced education combined with experience.
· Typically viewed as a specialist within the discipline of A/B testing and web analytics.
· May have broad knowledge of project management.
· Requires 7 years minimum prior relevant experience.
· At least 3 years’ relevant experience:
  • Experience with A/B testing using Adobe Target or other tools.
  • Experience using Adobe Analytics (preferred) or Google Analytics to create and interpreting reports.
  • Experience with documenting web analytics requirements and testing plans
  • Able to understand what the data is saying and communicate insights to nontechnical business partners
· Nice-to-Have experience:
  • Digital marketing experience
  • Experience with using data to identify business insights
  • Experience creating systems development lifecycle deliverables (such as business requirements documents, user acceptance test plans and scripts)
  • Basic-to-mid level SQL skills (preferably Oracle)
Education
Bachelors Degree Economics, Math, Accounting, or applicable field
Skills
Strong data collection, research and quantitative skills
Knowledge of the banking and financial services industries
Ability to summarize complex information into simple to understand information
Ability to develop relationships with multiple stakeholders throughout an organization
Exceptional MS Excel, PowerPoint and Word skills; experience with other data analysis tools a plus
Ability to self-motivate and a desire to work independently in a relatively unstructured environment.
· Strong written and verbal communication skills. Will be responsible for discerning client’s explicit and implicit needs. Will be responsible for writing standard systems development lifecycle business deliverables.
· Problem solving skills. Examples: Must be able to understand a business problem from the client’s perspective and propose potential solutions. The ability to visualize how existing technology solutions could be changed / leveraged to meet future needs would be a plus.
· Attention to detail, as well as the ability to see the “big picture”
· Organized
· Flexibility/ Adaptability
